plot: This film tells the story of how the bodies of 250 British and Australian World War I soldiers were been carefully exhumed from unmarked graves near Fromelles in northern France.
title: WW1: Finding the Lost Battalions
plot_es: This film tells the story of how the bodies of 250 British and Australian World War I soldiers were been carefully exhumed from unmarked graves near Fromelles in northern France.
plot_en: This film tells the story of how the bodies of 250 British and Australian World War I soldiers were been carefully exhumed from unmarked graves near Fromelles in northern France.
